arts.ttl: Sesko, Onana decisions made as Man United confirm XI for Fulham battle
arts.sum: Manchester United head coach Ruben Amorim names Benjamin Sesko and Andre Onana on the bench for Sunday's Premier League clash with Fulham at Craven Cottage.

arts.ttl: Ruben Amorim Doubles Down on Selection Stance With Man Utd XI vs. Fulham
arts.sum: Benjamin Šeško started on the bench for a second Premier League game in a row.

arts.ttl: Andre Onana left on the bench again as Manchester United prepare to face Fulham
arts.sum: The Cameroon goalkeeper was not in the squad against Arsenal and has now been left on the bench against Fulham

arts.ttl: Fulham vs Man Utd LIVE: Amorim benches Onana as both sides chase first win
arts.sum:
Fulham XI: Leno; Tete, Andersen, Bassey; Castagne, Berge, Lukic, Sessegnon; King, Muniz, Iwobi

Man Utd XI: Bayindir; Yoro, De Ligt, Shaw; Diallo, Fernandes, Casemiro, Dorgu; Mbeumo, Mount, Cunha

arts.ttl: Manchester United XI vs Fulham – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Manchester United travel to Craven Cottage on Sunday under significant early-season pressure to secure their first win of the campaign. While there were promising signs in the narrow 1-0 defeat to Arsenal, with new signings connecting well, the result has left Rúben Amorim’s side pointless. arts.ttl: Fulham vs Manchester United – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: Fulham and Manchester United are both chasing their first win of the season as they meet at Craven Cottage on Sunday. Fulham began their campaign with a solid away draw at Brighton. In contrast, Manchester United are already under pressure after an opening-day defeat to Arsenal.
